QuestData.Title: Dryad Delivery
QuestData.Description: Ah, there you are, $n. I've pored over the notes Teronis has made and it sounds like your next course of action is to find the other pieces of Dartol's rod.$B$BI would start by heading east along the road to Raynewood Tower.$B$BA dryad there named Shael'dryn is better suited to guide you. Seek her out.$B$BKeep the gem with you--Shael'dryn will need it if she's to help you recreate the rod.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Glowing Gem to Shael'dryn at Raynewood Tower in Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, Raene sent you? It must be serious indeed.$B$BWhat can I help you with?
